name: The Last Pancake
description:
My Entry for the 75th Trijam. Theme: 1 For Me, 2 For You

Made in 3 Hours.

This time the game itself is simpler but I tried to polish it up as much as I could.

You are taking part in a Pancake Eating Contest.

But in this contest it's not the goal to eat the most pancakes. Whoever eats the last pancake wins. But! The amount of pancakes left to eat is unknown.

Also, whenever one contestant eats a pancake, the other one immediately eats two!

Choose each round wether you eat a pancake or use one of your special abilities to try and find out how many pancakes are remaining to form a tactic and win the contest!

Source Code: https://github.com/TLochow/The-Last-Pancake
